subject: Television
Football
lead_paragraph: Jimmy Kimmel’s appearance on ESPN’s “Monday Night Football” was his last after he joked about where Joe Theismann was (fired and replaced by Ron Jaworski) in addition to other comments.
snippet: Jimmy Kimmel’s appearance on ESPN’s “Monday Night Football” was his last after he joked about where Joe Theismann was (fired and replaced by Ron Jaworski) in addition to other comments.
